description: Adds a resource to the Resilience Hub application and assigns it to the specified Application Components. If you specify a new Application Component, Resilience Hub will automatically create the Application Component.

parameters.name: additionalInfo
parameters.description: Currently, there is no supported additional information for resources. (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

parameters.name: appComponents
parameters.description: List of Application Components that this resource belongs to. If an Application Component is not part of the Resilience Hub application, it will be added. (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Used for an idempotency token. A client token is a unique, case-sensitive string of up to 64 ASCII characters. You should not reuse the same client token for other API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: logicalResourceId
parameters.description: Logical identifier of the resource. eksSourceName (string) --- Name of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service cluster and namespace this resource belongs to. Identifier of the resource. logicalStackName (string) --- The name of the CloudFormation stack this resource belongs to. resourceGroupName (string) --- The name of the resource group that this resource belongs to. terraformSourceName (string) --- The name of the Terraform S3 state file this resource belongs to.

nested_params.name: eksSourceName
nested_params.description: Name of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service cluster and namespace this resource belongs to.

nested_params.name: logicalStackName
nested_params.description: The name of the CloudFormation stack this resource belongs to.

nested_params.name: resourceGroupName
nested_params.description: The name of the resource group that this resource belongs to.

nested_params.name: terraformSourceName
nested_params.description: The name of the Terraform S3 state file this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: physicalResource
nested_items.description: Defines a physical resource. A physical resource is a resource that exists in your account. It can be identified using an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a Resilience Hub-native identifier.

nested_items.name: additionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional configuration parameters for an Resilience Hub application. If you want to implement additionalInfo through the Resilience Hub console rather than using an API call, see Configure the application configuration parameters.

nested_items.name: appComponents
nested_items.description: The application components that belong to this resource.

nested_items.name: additionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional configuration parameters for an Resilience Hub application. If you want to implement additionalInfo through the Resilience Hub console rather than using an API call, see Configure the application configuration parameters.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Indicates if a resource is included or excluded from the assessment.

nested_items.name: eksSourceName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service cluster and namespace this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: logicalStackName
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudFormation stack this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: resourceGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource group that this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: terraformSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Terraform S3 state file this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that owns the physical resource.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region that the physical resource is located in.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of physical resource identifier.
